website_summaries.verdict: A quality cat litter by a trusted brand, but some other brands edge it out when it comes to value.
pros: Has a pleasant scent and baking soda crystals that help control odors
The formula is 99% dust-free and falls on the lower end of the price range
cons: It doesn't clump urine quite as well as more costly brands, and some consumers commented that they prefer fragrance-free litter

customer_reviews.title: Cats Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the Arm & Hammer Super Scoop Clumping Litter, Unscented, and purchased this because it was a bigger box. Little did I know that it is not the sandy type of litter. My cats are pissed off. They will not use anything unless it is sandy, and this is more like the old type of clay cat litter. I didn't realize Arm & Hammer sold this kind. I bought 2 boxes and it's too heavy to return, so I don't know what to do with it. Probably donate it. Also, it's mushy to try to scoop out stuff. It's the worst crap I've seen in a cat litter. Literally.
customer_reviews.author: The Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Will use nothing else for my cat! He hates ...
customer_reviews.text: Will use nothing else for my cat! He hates using the litter box to begin with would rather go outside, so this is what he likes, and this is what he gets. I change the litter only once every other week, spot clean by scooping after each use and no odors ever! Also less tracking and dust flying around with this.
customer_reviews.author: H34ther

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: Some of these reviews have to be fake, one even tells you to buy another brand lol. I have Bengal and he is a Cinderella, as soon as I poured this litter he went in right away and did his business. I'm new to cat ownership but my cat like this litter and I've tried a few others. It has a nice subtle fragrance, I don't smell ammonia and clumps very well.
customer_reviews.author: leehesper

customer_reviews.title: The Arm & Hammer litter does indeed make some great clumps and with four adorable felines
customer_reviews.text: We've had multiple felines since the early 90's. As "new and better" brands of litter have come to market over the years, I think I've tried just about all of them. I have noticed from time to time that reviews for Arm & Hammer have varied and are often more negative than positive, which I don't understand. It's become the only littler we use for the feline members of our family. The Arm & Hammer litter does indeed make some great clumps and with four adorable felines, the scented litter is appreciated by "all" members of the family. (Quick Tip: Walmart still carries the 40 lb boxes, which I order online and they deliver within 2-4 days.)
customer_reviews.author: LS-Woodland Hills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kitty Litter For My 7 year Old Cat and my 10 Month Kitten
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I threw away previous kitty litter, and then poured this product into the litter box. I went to the litter box the next day and noticed that this product stopped all urine and feces odor and I was able to remove all feces and urine. Litter box stayed smelling nice. Reordered this box again. Staying with what works.
customer_reviews.author: Enid in Puerto Rico

customer_reviews.title: The best littler ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this littler for my two cats that share a litter box. From all other brands that I have tried, this is unbeatable the best one. It controls odors like no other and last a lot longer. With other brands I have to change littler every two days, even if I scoop daily. This one can easily go for 3 or even 4 days without a complete change. The odor control is maximum with a fragrance that is quite pleasant, not a hard perfume like others. Highly recommended specially for multiple cats.
customer_reviews.author: GSantana

customer_reviews.title: Great product, purrrfect for the multi-cat family. does what is says.
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain and so; of course it is out of stock in this size! PLEASE: don't buy scented cat litter, it is toxic to their respitory system, I like Arm & Hammer because they have always made good products; and before they came out with their own kitty litter, I would sprinkle the bottoms of my pans with the powder first to control odor. I hope this is back in stock soon, I have five cats and I really like using this litter; easy clumping and truly helps control the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Arachne

customer_reviews.title: not the old formula...this stuff is horrible
customer_reviews.text: i've gotten this in the past and it was great. i nice fine almost powdery consistency that was easy and lasted. this time it was like quaker oatmeal and was horrible to deal with. never clumped nicely. never really dried out so was constantly getting stuck to the scoop and one 40lb box only lasted a week with my one cat.
customer_reviews.author: Ige Gustavson

customer_reviews.title: Litter Delivered at Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Having Amazon deliver litter to my door is worth the price of admission alone. However, the price of this litter for the quantity supplied is reasonable and the product itself works well. I have three cats so staying supplied without hassle is a big bonus. For any Prime members looking to make life easier, especially if you don't want to haul a bunch of litter back from the store, I would strongly suggest this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vanna B

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the strong scent
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats (my wife's doing) and they poo a lot. This litter did a good job, however the scent was unbearable. It wasn't a bad scent but it was very strong. We both have allergy problems (we have three cats why?) and the scent would aggravate our allergies. I wasn't able to find an unscented from A&H for the same price so we ended up just doing the petco litter that you fill up yourself in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Y

customer_reviews.title: New Formulation of Double Duty? -- A&M Should be Ashamed
customer_reviews.text: I believe Arm & Hammer may have changed their formulation of "Double Duty"? The purported Double Duty product contained within the latest boxes received (10APR2017) is downright pitiful. This new product: has larger and darker granules than previous Double Duty product; does not clump well in the least (it's like digging through clay); and, does little to nothing at eliminating cat waste odors.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: This litter is okay if you don't mind a strong chemical perfume. Personally, I didn't like the smell; it's pretty strong. Also, even though this litter is cheap per pound my cats really went through it fast. And, even though it claims "low tracking", I can't see that happening as there is just the same amount of litter all over the floor. I'm going to go back to what I was using before (Precious Cat Ultra) and maybe invest in a covered litter box. Arrg...hate to spend the money but I'm tired of the mess.
customer_reviews.author: A. Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Pass. Us A&H Clump and Seal instead. It rocks! Literally! ;^)>
customer_reviews.text: This one doesn't clump well at all! However, their newer products are great and I highly recommend them. Check this one out:  And I use:  But mainly because I like the smell of it. It is not needed for odor control with the A&H Clump and Seal.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: The best cat litter
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cat litter. It does not create much dust and keeps the litter box virtually odorless, which is very important to me. My cat's litter box is in my bedroom, so odor-free litter is a must. It works so well that other people are surprised to learn that there is a cat in the house, since there is no smell whatsoever. The cat also likes it - and she is very picky about her litter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choking on dust & perfume
customer_reviews.text: The dust & perfume are unbelievable! When I poured it in a huge cloud of dust filled the room. Now when the cats use it they end up sneezing and every time the house is filled with the smell of cheap drug store perfume. Very unhealthy for fur babies. I had to throw most of it away.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Used for forever and what went wrong???
customer_reviews.text: Had to stop using. Even discussed with others I knew that used. All agreed formula change. ??? Sticks to box like glue.
customer_reviews.author: smckie

customer_reviews.title: I buy every two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I buy this litter (and get two boxes)about once a month. I love how well it works and how cost efficient it is. The only downside is that it can be very dusty at first - but this happens with most litters so it's not any worse than the other brands I've tried. I have 2 cats and this seems to do the trick. It can clump in larger size clumps at times that can make scooping difficult.
customer_reviews.author: TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed WIDELY varying reviews on these, but as a long-time cat keeper, let me set it straight: it works...It's cheap, and YES, this is a clay-litter...ie it gets mushy, but is fine for one to two cats. The price and smell are great! No complaints! Urine will require a large scoop, as has been stated in some reviews. I don't scoop much, only rotate litter a LOT. That's the best way to minimize odor and keep your feline happy.
customer_reviews.author: Felix9

customer_reviews.title: pure muck
customer_reviews.text: Muck at the bottom of the litter box.Muck all over my wooden floors. Had to mop 3X to get rid of it. If there is even one granule left it sticks to the floor and leaves a mucky smear. Did I say MUCK?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG I am free!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, someone just dropped off kitty litter at my door?? I am in heaven. I hate buying litter and hauling it up 3 flights of stairs in my apartment. I love you, Amazon Prime!! The litter is just that, scoopable high quality litter. NO complaints there. Well, Just one complaint, the packaging is ridiculously over kill. Mother Earth and all, tone it down a bit!
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: My cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: My cat refused to cover her poop. This litter is incredibly dusty and caused her to cough every time she used it. Three days later I changed back to her regular litter and no more problems. Based on how dusty it is, I can't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Did It

customer_reviews.title: Overall worthwhile, needs improvements on packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I frequently buy this litter. It is a great price, it is a very effective clumping litter and easy to sift. At this size I believe Amazon and needs to make some improvements on shipping it so that it can stay dry and intact. Amazon has been very good about replacing the ones that were wet or fell apart, but I would rather just received the original litter in time to fix kitties bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Frank

customer_reviews.title: Smells really strongly of perfume, but clumps well
customer_reviews.text: Smells like nasty "freshener"/perfumey crap. Not only is this not clear from the post (in fact, on the box it's a smallish note on the back,) but to me this screams "not a good product - have to cover that up with perfume." I have a *mild* scent allergy & I have to give away the rest of the box b/c it smells so strong :( Clumps well, the only reason I'm giving it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KicknChickn

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but very effective - a plus both ways
customer_reviews.text: It works well with little if any odor. I move the full contents into two smaller containers but appreciate the large volume made available. I have a 1-cat house and this works well, especially with easy-clean (my words) cat boxes. I'll continue to buy this product. A+
customer_reviews.author: Bannis

customer_reviews.title: and my cat is fine with it
customer_reviews.text: This litter works well for a lot of things. It contains smells, is relatively dust-free, it clumps well, and my cat is fine with it. My big issue though is that it clumps too well. I have to keep refilling the litter box much faster than I'm used to because so much of the kitty litter is getting absorbed every time my cat uses it. I would say this is going twice as fast as when I was using tidy cats instant action and so even though this was cheaper per ounce, tidy cats is better quality.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst litters I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: The worst! Clumps stick to the bottom of cat's paws and back of her legs. Tracked all over the house and into my bed. So dusty I can barely breathe while scooping the box. Makes me worry about cat's lungs while she is using the box. I will never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: ... is very strong and I feel that it smells like you are trying to cover up something
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very strong and I feel that it smells like you are trying to cover up something. I put baking soda on it sometimes to tone down the smell. Next time I am going to buy a litter without the strong smell and just use baking soda to cover up the bad smell from the cat!
customer_reviews.author: IK13

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have this product sent to my home instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have this product sent to my home instead of having to cart it from a store ...off the shelf, into the car and then into the house. This way, I just drag it in off the porch and slide it into the Laundry room. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's not cat waste either it's the actual litter that has the scent
customer_reviews.text: It smells. This litter has a smell to it that I can smell throughout the house. It's not cat waste either it's the actual litter that has the scent. The litter hasn't "clumped I am stuck chiseling off wet "concrete" from the bottom of the pan. I bought this because it was a better deal than my old litter, but I'm switching back. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: care

customer_reviews.title: Arm & Hammer makes a wonderful product. The clumping makes it exceptionally easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, Arm & Hammer makes a wonderful product. The clumping makes it exceptionally easy to scoop out the waste. My only reasoning for giving it three stars as opposed to five is because of the scent. The fragrance given to this particular product is overwhelming and very strong. We prefer the Arm & Hammer Unscented so that our home does smell like scented litter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal and its always on time. I love that i dont need to worry about lugging this around in a cart at a store, when i can just click order and its here on time everytime in two days. It works great, I have a cat that was in renal failure and he was using so much of the regular littler and his odor was very strong. I switched to this litter and got him some medication and the litter has stood up to both cats thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Ah

customer_reviews.title: Good Litter
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to go into the specifics between litters. I just don't know enough, or more accurately don't care to know or learn the subtle nuances that others note between them. For me, I consider it a success as long as the product works. This product fits the bill in that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in PA

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Switched over from Fresh Step Extreme and am very pleased with the performance. We only have 1 cat and live in a apartment, we scoop every day and bag waste and toss it before leaving for work. This litter is just great!! Fragrance is nice, clumps hard, and scoops with little dust. **The cost of it made us change from Fresh Step, as this litter is half the price and ships to my doorstep via amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: R & J

customer_reviews.title: Im a super skeptical consumer and tend to just go for anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying this after my bf bought a box. Im a super skeptical consumer and tend to just go for anything cheaper that I can reasonably assume won’t make much of a difference... this stuff makes a huge difference. Clumps so well and hides odor really well. We live in a really small apartment and i can’t smell the litterbox since we got this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LeeTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: Best litter I've ever found, by far!
customer_reviews.text: Best litter I've ever used. It has a very pleasant odor, it completely eliminates the unpleasant odors, and it clumps amazingly well! I'm never buying any other litter besides this again. My house doesn't smell like cat even a little bit! Lol
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pee mud.....gross.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened to this litter but it's not the same as you buy in the store. It was so nasty, I just tossed my entire litter box. The grains are HUGE, like that cheap $1 bag of non clumping clay litter. Pre won't clump, despite the claim of "super clumping" it just turns to pee mud at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Elbaioumy

customer_reviews.title: No the same
customer_reviews.text: Same packaging, but not the same litter as found in stores. Darker, larger, and does not clump the same or last nearly as long. Will stick to buying the same product in store even though it is more expensive. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: If you have small cats I think it would work much better.
customer_reviews.text: I have large cats- both are well over 20lbs. The arm and hammer double duty falls apart when scooping. I prefer the multi cat of the same brand. If I scoop twice a day then the clumps stay clumped. If you have small cats I think it would work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really eliminate the odor from our cat's use.
customer_reviews.text: It absorbed our cat's urine well but it didn't clump very well at all. We have one cat and, even with cleaning the litter box every day (sometimes 2 or 3 times) it really didn't eliminate the odor at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to this litter cause my cats to develop bald patched on teh back of their leggs.
customer_reviews.text: My two cats had an allergic to this litter, and now the back of their hind legs have bald spots where their bodies came in contact with the litter. This litter has a very strong scent.
customer_reviews.author: Tesa W

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Recently had to purchase this product as they did not have the normal arm and Hammer clumping litter Great non offensive mildly scented litter used for multiple cats and cat boxes. A really good litter. Some of the other letters on the market are very perfumed and because cats eyes to be irritated as well as my own this product was mildly scented clumped immediately
customer_reviews.author: shoreman

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Dealing with the litter box is the worst part of owning a cat. I don't know that I can give any litter a 5 star review, unless it could make the cat pee and poop disintegrate. This clumps well and really does make the smell for quite a while. We are repeat buyers for this particular litter. The one that comes in the black box does seem a little better at masking the smell, but Amazon had a good deal for this one and we've been happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Just a mom

customer_reviews.title: NO Limit litter.
customer_reviews.text: This is great litter- at a great price when you do cat rescue. The only problem is the limit. With 17 cats using 7 litter boxes being scooped 2-3 times a day the limit is frustrating. I am off to buy more litter at other stores when it would be more convenient to have it delivered. PetSmart has a once a year deal no limit. Target offers $5 back gift card sales every few weeks. I buy 140lbs at a time. Amazon give me an all the time deal and I will order all the time without having to run around.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as expected. No wonder it is so cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It says it's clumping litter, but really it isn't. It kind of clumps a little and then it just falls apart again. Plus, we used so much more of this litter than other brands, so it wasn't even saving any money. Save yourself the trouble and buy a real clumping litter.
customer_reviews.author: Harleen Quinzel

customer_reviews.title: Not Even Single Duty
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't clump as well as other brands, but this was the only option on "subscribe and save", so we are buying from the big box stores instead.
customer_reviews.author: B&B Fan

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite litter! I ordered it through Amazon for the ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats favorite litter! I ordered it through Amazon for the first time and it came in 2 days as promised! The cats and I were thrilled! I will be ordering the litter from now on. So beats having to pick up and put litter into a cart, then haul it out to a car, then haul it into the house....No trips to the store! What a deal!
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Natures Miracle crystal litter for 2 1/2 yrs. I decided to use a regular scoopable for a change. I picked this one because the price was cheap but really thought it wouldn't work very well. Boy was I surprised! The smell is nice and not overwhelming. I'm not good at scooping every day and I've left it for 4-5 days and you still couldn't smell it. Just bought the 40lb box.
customer_reviews.author: s. hutto

customer_reviews.title: Really Strong Perfurm-Like Odor!
customer_reviews.text: Really strong perfum-like smell !! Too strong even for my cat! Will never buy again. Also I have to constantly clean it off my cat's butt after use? Never had to do that with other litter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always running out of cat litter, having to run to the store and lug this stuff home. I go through the lightweight stuff way faster, so that seems like a waste of money to me. No cat litter is perfect, but I like this brand, and someone drops it off on my doorstep. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: I love clump litters
customer_reviews.text: Clumping cat pee is a great way to clean cat pee out daily and you don’t have that cat pee smell. Thro it uses a lot litter, but my cat’s box does not stink like well a cat box.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a bad review but this Arm and Hammer cat litter is just awful. It smells so bad I can hardly stand it. It doesn't clump at all and the litter just gets all well and messy. I'm surprise because Arm and Hammer is a well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Troughear

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, clumps well
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, and I've never noticed any issues with absorption and clumping. Very easy to scoop, and helps keep my home from smelling like crap! Just make sure you store it in a dry place.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Evans

customer_reviews.title: this cat litter is WAY to purfumey. You can ...
customer_reviews.text: this cat litter is WAY to purfumey. You can smell it through the house. I would have preferred it to be unscented, since this scented version hits you in the face as soon as you walk in and my litter box is in the laundry room on the other side of the house. Otherwise, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Green family

customer_reviews.title: I return to this brand time and time again, money can be saved but only at the misery of the nose!
customer_reviews.text: The best cat litter... always and forever. Every now and then I buy some lower cost stuff, and with 3 cats and 3 boxes outside my office door I notice the difference very quickly. This brand, and type... or even the multi-cat version does the best job for odor control I have found in over 20 years of having multiple cats in the family.
customer_reviews.author: YsLadyMN

customer_reviews.title: Works well and makes scooping much easier
customer_reviews.text: This is now the only litter i purchase. Great clumping power and makes scooping the box a breeze. I like the odor control aspect as well. I have priced this exact box at several other places and Amazon has the best deal. We have two cats and have had no issues with this litter.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Philhart

customer_reviews.title: Busted box but affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great value and get product however box was busted during delivery and of course there's not a way to return a busted box of cat litter
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leclair

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job of clumping up and all however it does ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of clumping up and all however it does not do a good job of absorbing smells and also has a sickly perfume that makes my stomach churn. I bought a very cheap litter from the local grocery store to replace it and it did a MUCH better job at absorbing smells.
customer_reviews.author: Siamrut P.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of mud
customer_reviews.text: This stuff just makes mud in the bottom of the litter pan, and it has a cloying disinfectant smell when wet. To be fair, my cat does tend to put all her urine in one spot, but other litters have never made this kind of mess.
customer_reviews.author: LovesDressage

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT cover up oders from multi cat house.
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT cover up odors from multi cat house as product states. Would not purchase again. back to Dr. Elsey's Precious Cat!!! So far its the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Best litter!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and this is the best litter I've found. Clumps fast and tight. Does a great job of eliminating odors as well. I have a friend that does cat rescue. She has fostered close to a hundred cats over the years and this is her favorite litter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Used to love it, now, not so much. :(
customer_reviews.text: I'm no longer impressed with this litter. I don't know if the formula was changed or what but I had to toss it after just 3 days with daily scooping. It just did not hide the odors at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zackary Stringer

customer_reviews.title: not the best, but will work fine if you clean every day.
customer_reviews.text: doesn't block the odor as well as it advertises, It's a nice price but I wouldn't let sit for more than a day. I have 3 cats and I clean the box every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was great, seller is great, product stinks. LITERALLY! Horrible. Almost pointless. Waste of time and money. If you want to smell yucky kitty litter, and spend more time than you should cleaning it and want your cat to find any other place in your home to "go" than this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Darkmadam

customer_reviews.title: Good litter, pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many other reviews I found the scent to be pleasant and not overwhelming. However, there is a considerable amount of dust. It doesn't seem to track very much. Good litter, good value. I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not good for odor trapping
customer_reviews.text: The litter did not help with the odor. It left a weird smell every time our cat used the box. We've tried many different litter products and this one did not trap odor very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn R.

customer_reviews.title: I hate this smell
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst cat litter. People love it for some reason but it makes my cat's pee smell even worse and smells up the whole room. I prefer TidyCats with glade
customer_reviews.author: Molly Joy

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the Freshstep with Febreeze
customer_reviews.text: Does not clump well. Cat pee will turn into clay. Plus - smells a bit chemically/not pleasant. I would recommend the Freshstep with Febreeze.
customer_reviews.author: ms big and milky

customer_reviews.title: Great litter, no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all different litters in the past, cheap ones expensive ones whatever I can find. I love this product because it really holds its truth as being clumping, which is nice and an oder eliminator. I clean the litter boxes once a day and I never have issues with the house smelling. I have two cats and two different litter boxes within 1400 square feet and it smells nice. It is a very big size and will fill a litter box about 7-8 times. I clean the litter box daily, but only change the litter once a week so this will last me about a month. Great product, great size, great price, and great smell!!
customer_reviews.author: mmp1023

customer_reviews.title: I recommend just cheap cat litter and scoop
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 cat pans got stinky very quickly and made the house smell and we scooped 1-2 times a day. We have 2 cats. I recommend just cheap cat litter and scoop. My husband says it smells better using the cheap stuff and he is very picky.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite litter
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Clumps better than any other I've tried . Covers odors . Very dusty but worth it . Another random bonus - my dog doesn't like it - the first litter she won't stick her nose in , thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of the price, but wont be purchasing again. It seemed to be really strong smelling (highly fragranced) and dusty. Also, it seemed like I could smell the urine yet. I switched to a fragrance free, low dust litter- which my cats are using way better and it is better for their health.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: The litter also does not do a good job of clumping at all
customer_reviews.text: Quality and size of litter grains was very inconsistent. The litter also does not do a good job of clumping at all. I'd recommend looking at other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: I'll pass on the smell
customer_reviews.text: It clumped, but the odor was very noticeable after a couple of days. It just didn't work on urine very well, leaving me to spray Fabreeze and coat the box in baking soda. There are other hard clumping products from Arm & Hammer that do better jobs for the same price. Try them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitties say no more of this
customer_reviews.text: This litter is not good for multiple cats. Hard to clean the box as it just turns into a saturated wet clay clump that sticks to the pan and the scooper. Good at controlling odors and decent price but will not use again
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This cat litter was great at first but now it won't clump my cats ...
customer_reviews.text: This cat litter was great at first but now it won't clump my cats pee and it's just like the other reviews and pictures. It's cheap but I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as fine and doesn't clump as well either
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the same litter as I bought in the store. Not quite as fine and doesn't clump as well either. Also does not trap smell like the store version
customer_reviews.author: Titan

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and this works great for them, and so far I have seen no dust, which is wonderful! Will definitely purchase again, especially because it was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3Cuties

customer_reviews.title: Litter for my poopy kitty 😍
customer_reviews.text: Pretty hefty, but awesome price, arrived fast, thank you so much! And no dust, so I don't suffer a sneeze attacks.
customer_reviews.author: KuroNeko

customer_reviews.title: Great litter, bad delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. It is the best litter I've every used, especially if you have multiple cats. It clumps nicely and hides odors well. However, the box that was delivered to me was missing quite a bit of litter and when I carried it inside, litter spilled all over my house. It was a big headache.
customer_reviews.author: JA Torres

customer_reviews.title: so controlling the smell is a massive deal to me as I refuse to live in a house that smells like cats on parade
customer_reviews.text: My cats number 2 in this little day in and day out. I have four total, so controlling the smell is a massive deal to me as I refuse to live in a house that smells like cats on parade. It does the trick. Clumps well. Not a lot of fuss and my cats have zero aversions to this type of litter. It also doesn't overpower the house with litter smell, which I appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: The Stripe

customer_reviews.title: ... a little too much and even the cat doesn’t like it. There is a lot of dust when ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell from this product is a little too much and even the cat doesn’t like it. There is a lot of dust when you pour it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan2131

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This letter is OK. It just doesn’t seem to keep the orders down as much as fresh step cat litter. I see some of the other reviews and it seems like many others else love it, but it just doesn’t seem to work well for our household.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: This litter works great, but the smell of the litter is almost ...
customer_reviews.text: This litter works great, but the smell of the litter is almost worse than the smell of the kitty waste. The litter is extremely aromatic, it send big clouds of litter dust into the air as you scoop it and really irritates your nose and throat. Perhaps we are just sensitive to it, but we need to switch to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Reed

customer_reviews.title: Does not clump, misleading
customer_reviews.text: This litter does not clump, urine crumbles and does not scoop at all. Wish i could return. Does not do as described.
customer_reviews.author: MONAROD

customer_reviews.title: I really don't like the smell and I feel it doesn't last as ...
customer_reviews.text: This litter really doesn't work well for my cats. I really don't like the smell and I feel it doesn't last as long as fresh step.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Dent

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cat litter, helps keep dust and odour levels down. When it comes to keeping your home clean, hygienic it's worth every penny to buy the best, cat litter isn't something to be scrimped on.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Bowler

customer_reviews.title: My house smells.
customer_reviews.text: My house smells horrible. I clean the litter box every other day. Fresh Step is MUCH better and I recommend going with that instead. I thought you were good, Arm & Hammer. I thought you were good. But you're not. You're horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Tyler

customer_reviews.title: clumping isn't that great, anti-odor properties are alright
customer_reviews.text: Too pricey, clumping isn't that great, anti-odor properties are alright, though. It's so-so, at best.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate_Joke

customer_reviews.title: Not as much as i was hoping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this going off the weight to see how much I was getting vs other brands. Turns out this is less but weighs more than what I normally buy so this was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Crapgamer17

customer_reviews.title: You will use a lot of it.
customer_reviews.text: Its great to get this on Prime instead of Sams, but was buying this every 3 days and it was coating me a fortune. Buying the precious cat ultra premium now, about the same price and its so much better, still dust free. A bag lasts me over a week now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great litter. They changed it to an add on item which is disappointing though.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Cat odor is will always be a problem
customer_reviews.text: Oder is not possible to kill but it is better than some others, I still have to clean the box every morning : (
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: This litter clumped well and didn't track much. But it just didn't cover the odor at all.
customer_reviews.author: JoyS Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Almost no dust. Super clumping. Vey, very pleased with this product. Keeps odors at bay. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen King

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with a sense of smell
customer_reviews.text: This had a strong smell that filled my house. My cat couldn't stand it either. I had to find something else. I guess if it was in the basement or something it would be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Cookiek8

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it. No dust. Easy to scoop. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: First let me say my cats don't like scented litter. This Double Duty litter has such little scent, I only smell it when I open a fresh box. My cats love it. No dust. Easy to scoop. And I scoop every day. Better price than the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: hellflower

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! 100% odor eliminator!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff truly works!!! Not even a whiff of a smell. Amazing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dsaunar

customer_reviews.title: Arm & Hsmmsr Cat Litter
customer_reviews.text: Best I have used of all the Arm& Hammer types. Not too much perfume. Also price is very reasonable. This price helps us SENIORS keep our Pets.
customer_reviews.author: Mea

customer_reviews.title: Good cat litter for multi-cat househole
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly!! Good cat litter for multi-cat househole. The clumps stay clumped and there is not a lot of dust when pouring fresh litter or scooping the used out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Good 😊 stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Order 40# size for economics but hard to lift for me. If you're 💪 no problem. Works well for two cats with an elastic heavy duty liner so can just pickup and toss in trash
customer_reviews.author: Actor woman

product_meta.title: Arm & Hammer Double Duty Advanced Odor Control Clumping Cat Litter
product_meta.description: Size:26.3 PoundARM & HAMMER Double Duty Clumping Litter’s breakthrough formula destroys urine AND feces odors on contact, and helps your home stay fresh and clean.
feature_bullets: Powerful Moisture Activated Baking Soda Crystals Eliminate Odors On Contact
Rock-solid clumps let you remove the source of odors easily
Fresh Scent Refreshes Litter Every Time Your Cat Uses The Litter Box
